name: 尤尚邦
objective:
銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.
schedule:
Week 1: Opening of the present lecture
Week 2-4: Part I Introduction
Week 5-8: Part II The Fusion Zone
Week 9: Midterm Presentation
Week 10-13: Part IV The Heat-Affected Zone
Week 10-17: Part V Special Topics
Week 18: Final Presentation
materials: Welding Metallurgy, Kou, Sindo, Wiley, ISBN:1119524814
consultation: 教師諮商時間與聯絡請以 email 聯絡預約。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
